message.content:
I need to identify the line item that represents the systematic allocation of the depreciable amount of an asset over its useful life - this is the depreciation expense.

Looking at the cash flow statement, I can see the line item "Depreciation" with an amount of 100239.89 on 2024-02-01. Depreciation is precisely the systematic allocation of the depreciable amount of an asset over its useful life, so this is the value I need to extract.

```json
{"solution": {'value': '100239.89'}}
```
